pr_title: Inject null provider when thrift execution is not needed

timeline.message: Inject null provider when thrift execution is not needed
Inject null provider when thrift execution is not needed
Inject null provider when thrift execution is not needed

timeline.bodyText: Can we just make this Optional? :)
timeline.author: wenleix

replies.bodyText: I would also prefer Optional here.
replies.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText: Have you not pushed yet since it's still @nullable?
replies.author: caithagoras

replies.bodyText: Decided to go with nullable for injection but change the member variable to optional. This for the most part avoids potential bugs of having a nullable variable, and doesn't require me to figure out how to inject Optional 😂
replies.author: rongrong
